name: Operation Cheese
description:
Made for Trijam #173

Theme: You are the monster

I made a video on how I made the game:


Made in 3 hours in Scratch

You have 1 mission: 

The mouse has planted cheeses in his field 

and you have to stomp on the cheeses!!! 

But watch out for the poisonous cheeses!!!

/BOSS

Move: WASD or Arrow keys

Stomp: Space

Credits: Screen shake by ShiftClickLearn

Music:

Mechanolith

Kevin Macleod
